alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 9:40PM CDT until April 09 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Flooding is expected on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday afternoon, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 83.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 91.8 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
